name: research.wad
description: Before things got out of hand on Phobos, UAC engineers installed some prototype gates at a research facility on earth that's lo- cated in an old manor up in the mountains. As on Phobos & Deimos, unwelcome visitors used the gates to come in, spread mayhem, and set up housekeeping. As part of the task of eradicating the invaders from earth, you decide to pay the base a visit.
